      @GetMapping("/page") public R<PageResult<SysUserDTO>> page(@RequestParam(defaultValue="1") Integer current, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") Integer size, SysUserDTO user)

      @GetMapping("/list") public R<List<SysUserDTO>> list(SysUserDTO user)

    • getById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public R<SysUserDTO> getById(@PathVariable Long id)

    • add

      @PostMapping public R<SysUserDTO> add(@Validated @RequestBody SysUserDTO user)

    • update

      @PutMapping public R<SysUserDTO> update(@Validated @RequestBody SysUserDTO user)

    • remove

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public R<Void> remove(@PathVariable Long id)

    • changePassword

      @PutMapping("/password") public R<Void> changePassword(@RequestParam Long userId, @RequestParam String oldPassword, @RequestParam String newPassword)

      @GetMapping("/username/{username}") public R<SysUserDTO> getByUsername(@PathVariable String username)

      @GetMapping("/dept/{deptId}") public R<List<SysUserDTO>> listByDeptId(@PathVariable Long deptId)

    • listByRoleId

      @GetMapping("/role/{roleId}") public R<List<SysUserDTO>> listByRoleId(@PathVariable Long roleId)

    • assignRoles

      @PutMapping("/{userId}/roles") public R<Void> assignRoles(@PathVariable Long userId, @RequestBody List<Long> roleIds)

      @PutMapping("/profile") public R<SysUserDTO> updateProfile(@Validated @RequestBody SysUserDTO user)
